article_title: Wrong Obamacare Form Tax Filers Get Relief From IRS

article_metadata.author: Robert W. Wood

og.description: The 800,000 incorrect tax forms sent under the ACA may not be so bad after all. The 50,000 people who already filed taxes based on the incorrect information don't have to amend, says the IRS.
og.title: Wrong Obamacare Form Tax Filers Get Relief From IRS
